page.title: 05A Child's View of the Police
page.content: In our police force we have the{beat {policeman}who patrols the streets and keeps a look out, and the{C.I.D department which deals in criminal records and matching fingerprints and investigating murders. The{traffic {patrol}makes sure that the traffic flows smoothly without any accidents. There are{doghandlers}who work with dogs that can help track people, sniff out bombs, explosives and drugs. The {mounted branch}ride on horses and keep peace at football matches and demonstrations. If we didn't have police our country would be unsafe to live in. They also make sure criminals are brought to justice. When a criminal is caught for stealing he is taken to a{magistrates' {court,}for murder he would go to a {crown court}for trial. The police do a good job in keeping us safe.
